SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR.pdf: Página 40
Example
•
Suppose that someone wants to build a lightweight ontology based on 
the European Training Thesaurus (ETT), which is a term-based 
thesaurus and it follows the record-based model.
PR-NOR Example
40
© A Method for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources for Building Ontologies 
Boris Villazón-Terrazas, Mari Carmen Suárez Figueroa
speaker: SYSTEM
